Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

1 #include "KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError.h"
2 
3 namespace Kassiopeia
4 {
5 
6  double KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::fEpsilon = 1e-14;
7 
8  KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError() :
9  fAbsoluteError(1e-12),
10  fSafetyFactor(0.5),
11  fSolverOrder(5),
12  fTimeStep(1),
13  fFirstStep(true)
14  {
15  }
16 
17  KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError( const KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError& aCopy ) :
18  KSComponent(),
19  fAbsoluteError(aCopy.fAbsoluteError),
20  fSafetyFactor(aCopy.fSafetyFactor),
21  fSolverOrder(aCopy.fSolverOrder),
22  fTimeStep(aCopy.fTimeStep),
23  fFirstStep(aCopy.fFirstStep)
24  {
25  if(fSafetyFactor > 1.0){fSafetyFactor = 1.0/fSafetyFactor;};
26  }
27 
28  KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError* KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::Clone() const
29  {
30  return new KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError( *this );
31  }
32 
33  KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::~KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError()
34  {
35  }
36 
37  void KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::ActivateObject()
38  {
39  if(fSafetyFactor > 1.0){fSafetyFactor = 1.0/fSafetyFactor;};
40  fFirstStep = true;
41  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> resetting, safety factor is <" <<fSafetyFactor <<"> " << eom );
42  return;
43  }
44 
45  void KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::Calculate( const KSTrajExactParticle& aParticle, double& aValue )
46  {
47  if( fFirstStep == true )
48  {
49  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> on first step" << eom );
50 
51  if( aParticle.GetMagneticField().Magnitude() > 1e-9 )
52  {
53  fTimeStep = 1.0/aParticle.GetCyclotronFrequency();
54  }
55  else
56  {
57  double v = aParticle.GetVelocity().Magnitude();
58  fTimeStep = 100*(fAbsoluteError/v);
59  }
60  if(fSafetyFactor > 1.0){fSafetyFactor = 1.0/fSafetyFactor;};
61  fFirstStep = false;
62  }
63  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> suggesting <" << fTimeStep << ">" << eom );
64  aValue = fTimeStep;
65  return;
66  }
67 
68  void KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::Check( const KSTrajExactParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSTrajExactParticle& aFinalParticle, const KSTrajExactError& anError, bool& aFlag )
69  {
70  fTimeStep = aFinalParticle.GetTime() - anInitialParticle.GetTime();
71 
72  //get position error
73  double position_error_mag = std::fabs( (anError.GetPositionError()).Magnitude() );
74  aFlag = UpdateTimeStep(position_error_mag);
75  return;
76  }
77

81  {
82  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> on first step" << eom );
83

85  {

92  }

94  fFirstStep = false;
95  }
96  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> suggesting <" << fTimeStep << ">" << eom );

99  }

144  void KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::Calculate( const KSTrajAdiabaticParticle& aParticle, double& aValue )
145  {
146  if( fFirstStep == true )
147  {
148  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> on first step" << eom );
149  fTimeStep = 1.0/aParticle.GetCyclotronFrequency();
150  if(fSafetyFactor > 1.0){fSafetyFactor = 1.0/fSafetyFactor;};
151  fFirstStep = false;
152  }
153  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> suggesting <" << fTimeStep << ">" << eom );
154  aValue = fTimeStep;
155  return;
156  }
157 
158  void KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::Check( const KSTrajAdiabaticParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSTrajAdiabaticParticle& aFinalParticle, const KSTrajAdiabaticError& anError, bool& aFlag )
159  {
160  fTimeStep = aFinalParticle.GetTime() - anInitialParticle.GetTime();
161 
162  //get position magnitude (on guiding center) and its error
163  double position_error_mag = (anError.GetGuidingCenterPositionError()).Magnitude();
164  aFlag = UpdateTimeStep(position_error_mag);
165  return;
166  }
167 
168  bool KSTrajControlPositionNumericalError::UpdateTimeStep(double error)
169  {
170  //check to see if the step was acceptable
171  if( error < fAbsoluteError )
172  {
173  if( error < fEpsilon*fAbsoluteError)
174  {
175  //position error is exceedingly small or zero
176  //so we double the stepsize because the normal calculation
177  //for estimating the new stepsize may fail
178  fTimeStep *= 2;
179  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> doubling stepsize from <"<<fTimeStep<<"> to <"<<2*fTimeStep<<"> at position error <" << error << ">" << eom) ;
180  return true; //aFlag, step succeeded
181  }
182 
183  //time step is ok, local error does not exceed bounds
184  //estimate the next time step
185  double beta = error/std::pow(fTimeStep, fSolverOrder);
186  double updatedTimeStep = fSafetyFactor*std::pow( fAbsoluteError/beta , 1.0/fSolverOrder);
187  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> modifying stepsize from <"<<fTimeStep<<"> to <"<<updatedTimeStep<<"> at position error <" << error << ">" << eom) ;
188  fTimeStep = updatedTimeStep;
189  return true; //aFlag, step succeeded
190  }
191  else
192  {
193  //local error is too large so we need to decrease the time step
194  //estimate the next time step
195  double beta = error/std::pow(fTimeStep, fSolverOrder);
196  double updatedTimeStep = fSafetyFactor*std::pow( fAbsoluteError/beta , 1.0/fSolverOrder);
197  trajmsg_debug( "stepsize control <"<< GetName() <<"> decreasing stepsize from <"<<fTimeStep<<"> to <"<<updatedTimeStep<<"> at position error <" << error << ">" << eom) ;
198  fTimeStep = updatedTimeStep;
199  return false; //aFlag, step failed
200  }
201 
202  }
203 
204 
205 }
